TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {1894=In compliance with the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 (Section 504), a disabled student who is enrolled in a course that is scheduled in a non-accessible room may request (a) to be changed to another section of the course that is accessible or (b) that the location of the course be changed to an accessible room. Students who qualify may initiate requests for course section changes or room re-assignments by calling 231-7198.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {18100=NORTH DAKOTA STATE UNIVERSITY Office of Registration and Records Phone: +1 (701) 231-7981 / Toll Free: +1 (800) 608-6378 / Fax: (701) 231-8959 Campus address: Ceres Hall 110 Physical/delivery address: 1301 Administration Ave., Fargo, ND 58102 Mailing address: NDSU Dept. 2831 / P.O. Box 6050 / Fargo, ND 58108-6050 Page manager: Office of Registration and Records}
textBeforeTable: NDSU courses may be scheduled at the following sites, which are located off the main campus. Please allow extra time to travel to/from classes scheduled at these sites. For information about free transportation options provided by NDSU and/or the City of Fargo, go to NDSU/MAT Bus Information. Off-Campus Class Locations/Addresses  Shepperd Arena Alba Bales House Agricultural & Biosystems Engineering In the following buildings, only the first floor is accessible to those with physical disabilities. All other buildings are fully accessible to those with physical disabilities. In compliance with the Rehabilitation Act of 1973 (Section 504), a disabled student who is enrolled in a course that is scheduled in a non-accessible room may request (a) to be changed to another section of the course that is accessible or (b) that the location of the course be changed to an accessible room. Students who qualify may initiate requests for course section changes or room re-assignments by calling 231-7198. Room Access for Students with Disabilities Classroom Accessibility & Off-Campus Class Locations
